jd: Hi Everyone,Greetings from Securekloud.We have an opening for a new position and if you are interested please let me know. Job Title - Support Services Project ManagerJob Location - Baton Rouge, LouisianaJob Type - Onsite (Louisiana Locals ONLY - Need Local Proof)Exp - 10+ years exp The scope of the proposed services will include the following:● Provide day-to-day project management support;● Activity and resource planning;● Creation of project documentation: daily, weekly, semi-monthly and monthly status reports; project schedules and plans, meeting minutes, risks and issues, other documentation as needed;● Analyzing project risks and issues, help identify ways to mitigate risks;● Process monitoring;● Monitor project deliverables;● Provide day-to-day support for on-going processes;● Provide on-going evaluation and improvements for processes; work in needed areas to provide support services for agency’s workload demands.● Documentation of specifications and requirements tracking;● Conduct cost/benefit analysis; Thanks & Regards, V.K.Ramanujam. Mobile: 2 1 4 - 9 3 5 - 9 2 1 2
